project.name: |-- 005-mapping
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Mapping with map + Flattening Streams with flatMap
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
MappingRunner: Illustrates the use of map() with a function.
FlatteningStreamsRunner: Illustrates the use of flatMap(). It also includes an example of a nested traversing of streams.
